name: Mylee Ejercito
text: MarisBarney , i hope that what you're thinking is true na this allowed us to remember. I worry kasi na the people who are remembering are the "elite" -- we need to make sure we reach out to the rest of the voters and combat the very rampant misinformation out there.

source_obj.text: MarisBarney , i hope that what you're thinking is true na this allowed us to remember. I worry kasi na the people who are remembering are the "elite" -- we need to make sure we reach out to the rest of the voters and combat the very rampant misinformation out there.
